title: Rocket Bot Royale
description: A side-scrolling tank battle game with a focus on physics and destruction. Control a tank equipped with rockets and other weapons, battling against other players in a last-tank-standing format. Features destructible terrain, power-ups, and strategic gameplay in a 2D environment with 3D graphics.
how_to_play: Use A/D or Left/Right arrows to move your tank. Adjust your firing angle with W/S or Up/Down. Press Space to fire your weapon. Collect power-ups and coins to upgrade your tank and weapons. The rising water level forces players to move upward as the match progresses. Be the last tank surviving to win!
